name: Udder Chaos (Lanyard)
description:
Bessie the dairy cow has wandered into the local sawmill industrial complex while she was following the scent of the foreman's chocolate donuts. Guide her through the Udder Chaos she discovers within to reach the green goal zone on each level.

CONTROLS:

A and D to rotate left and right

Spacebar to Spray Milk and launch Bessie into the air

Produced by request for a friend and made during the Game Off 2022 jam with the theme of "Cliché". Music courtesy of Sulo Sounds.
